title: Hong Kong Bankruptcies
description: Bankruptcies in Hong Kong decreased to 7030 Companies in August from 9720 Companies in July of 2022. Bankruptcies in Hong Kong averaged 5244.94 Companies from 1994 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 20646 Companies in March of 2019 and a record low of 62 Companies in February of 2020. In Hong Kong, bankruptcies account for insolvent corporations who cannot repay their debts to creditors and carry on with their business. This page provides - Hong Kong Bankruptcies - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Census and Statistics Department, Hong Kong
